summary: Frontend i18n testing completed. Album names and legal disclaimer translate correctly across all 6 languages. ONE CRITICAL BUG FOUND: The 'Criaturas Fantásticas' album shows raw i18n key 'categories.cartas_coleccionables' because the database category_key doesn't match the i18n key 'trading_cards'.

ui_bugs.issue: Raw i18n key 'categories.cartas_coleccionables' displayed for 'Criaturas Fantásticas' album
ui_bugs.root_cause: Database has category_key='cartas_coleccionables' but i18n.js uses key 'trading_cards'
fix_options: Option 1: Update database to use category_key='trading_cards' instead of 'cartas_coleccionables'
Option 2: Add 'cartas_coleccionables' key to all language translations in i18n.js

passed_tests: Album names translate correctly when switching languages via Settings page
Language switcher works correctly in Settings page (tested ES, EN, PT)
Album list page displays translated album names for all 6 albums
Album detail page displays translated album name and category
Legal disclaimer (fanMadeDisclaimer) translates correctly per language
No raw albumNames.* keys visible in UI
Page titles translate correctly (Mis Álbumes, My Albums, Meus Álbuns)
Category subtitles translate correctly for: sports, anime, superheroes, entertainment
Status badges translate correctly (ACTIVO/ACTIVE/ATIVO, INACTIVO/INACTIVE/INATIVO, PRÓXIMAMENTE/COMING SOON/EM BREVE)
failed_tests: Category 'trading_cards' shows raw key 'categories.cartas_coleccionables' for Criaturas Fantásticas album
action_items: FIX REQUIRED: Update database category_key from 'cartas_coleccionables' to 'trading_cards' for the Criaturas Fantásticas album, OR add 'cartas_coleccionables' translations to all 6 languages in i18n.js
critical_code_review_comments: Database category_key values must match i18n translation keys exactly
Current mismatch: DB has 'cartas_coleccionables', i18n.js has 'trading_cards'
The getCategoryDisplay() helper function correctly falls back to raw category if translation key not found, but this causes raw keys to appear

test_credentials.note: DEV_MODE enabled - OTP codes visible in backend logs at /var/log/supervisor/backend.err.log

context_for_next_testing_agent: i18n implementation is 90% complete. Album names, page titles, status badges, and legal disclaimer all translate correctly. The only issue is the 'Criaturas Fantásticas' album category showing raw key 'categories.cartas_coleccionables'. Fix by updating DB or adding translation key.

legal_disclaimer.en: This album is a fan-made collection and is not affiliated with or endorsed by any official organization.
